item.title: More support for Southeast Asia’s COVID-19 response

item.title: Supporting an inclusive recovery this Pride Month
item.media:description: People wearing purple OutRight T-shirts and carrying Pride flag paraphernalia. Photo credit: Hanna Benavides
item.description: Google is providing $4M to support LGBTQ+ organizations worldwide, and working to make our products more inclusive and helpful.

author.name: Juan Rajlin

item.title: Apoyando una recuperación inclusiva este mes del Orgullo
item.media:description: Personas vestidas con camisetas moradas de OutRight y con parafernalia de la bandera del Orgullo. Crédito de la foto: Hanna Benavides
item.description: Google provee US$4 millones para apoyar a organizaciones LGBTQ+ en todo el mundo y sigue trabajando para que sus productos sean más inclusivos y útiles.

item.title: Our commitment to COVID-19 vaccine equity
item.media:description: Illustration of the globe surrounded by medical-related icons.

item.title: How we’re helping get vaccines to more people
item.media:description: Illustration of a grayscale streetscape with various buildings, including one with a "Covid-19 Vaccination Site" sign and a blue Maps pin on the roof. A clinic staffer stands at the door with a clipboard. Various people wait in a line, wearing masks.
item.description: We’re providing $150M+ to promote vaccine education and equitable distribution, making it easier to find info about the vaccine and more.

og.title: How we’re helping get vaccines to more people
og.description: We’re providing $150M+ to promote vaccine education and equitable distribution, making it easier to find info about the vaccine and more.
